name: SDL2 Adventure
description:
This is a short adventure game made in SDL2, as part of the Parallel Realities SDL2 game tutorials.

You can find out more at:

https://www.parallelrealities.co.uk/tutorials

As this is a tutorial, there are certain limitations:

* You cannot load or save your game

* You cannot adjust the sound or music

* You cannot adjust the controls

== Gameplay ==

You play as a prisoner, who has been brought into a special dungeon created by the cruel Dungeon Mistress. The goal of the game is to find 4 magical "Icons" and return them to the Dungeon Mistress, to earn your freedom. You can walk into objects (items, characters, doors, etc) to interact with them.

== Controls ==

Move: WASD

Tab: Open / close inventory

Escape: Close inventory

Return: Drop selected inventory item

Space / Return: Next dialog close
